document_data.mainbody:
ylgar was the name of the prized pet goldfish of the Xanathar, Zushaxx. As of 1492 DR, unbeknownst to its owner, the fish had died and been replaced by the members of the Xanathars Thieves Guild several times.
Sylgar had two fishbowls a larger one that weighed  and was over  in diameter, and a smaller one used primarily for feeding that weighed .
Sylgars main caretaker was Ott Steeltoes.
